title: BIM Model Audit
subtitle: Comprehensive examination of Building Information Models to ensure accuracy, integrity, and compliance with industry standards.
description: A BIM model audit is a systematic and comprehensive examination of a Building Information Model to assess its accuracy, integrity, quality, and compliance with predefined project requirements, industry standards (like ISO 19650), and quality benchmarks.

Our BIM model audit services provide thorough validation of your models, identifying potential issues before they impact construction. We use advanced tools and methodologies to ensure your BIM models meet the highest standards of quality and reliability.
benefits: Early identification of model errors and inconsistencies
Compliance with industry standards and regulations
Reduced risk of costly construction errors

services.title: Model Validation
services.description: Comprehensive validation of model geometry, parameters, and data integrity.

services.title: Compliance Checking
services.description: Verification against ISO 19650, BIM protocols, and project-specific standards.

services.title: Quality Metrics
services.description: Detailed analysis of model quality using industry-standard metrics and KPIs.

services.title: Error Detection
services.description: Identification and classification of model errors, clashes, and inconsistencies.

services.title: Audit Reporting
services.description: Comprehensive reports with findings, recommendations, and action plans.

services.title: Remediation Support
services.description: Guidance and support for correcting identified issues and improving model quality.

cta.title: Ensure Your BIM Models Meet the Highest Standards
